item.title: Principle component analysis vs support vector machine
item.description: Background library(knitr) opts_chunk$set(engine.path = '/anaconda3/bin/python') Load proteomics data import pandas as pd import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt # plt.style.use('ggplot') import matplotlib plt.style.use('ggplot') # matplotlib.use('Agg') scan = pd.read_csv('/Users/DL/Documents/Jupyter project/Somascan Protein Creatinine/somascan.csv') print(scan.head()) ## SomaID SeqID Subject ID 9041 \ ## 0 SL019100 10336-3_3 E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase CHIP 11.067752 ## 1 SL007136 10337-83_3 CCAAT/enhancer-binding protein beta 12.721172 ## 2 SL001731 10339-48_3 Gamma-enolase 2.263340 ## 3 SL019096 10342-55_3 E3 SUMO-protein ligase PIAS4 3.
